Class LineInspector.ReplacementInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.wuic.engine.LineInspector.ReplacementInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    LineInspector

    public final class LineInspector.ReplacementInfo
extends Object

    This object indicates the index of the rewritten statement and the associated list of nuts.
